message:
Here's the announcement you've all been waiting for. Spring Fest, IIT Kharagpur and MRF Tyres proudly present the music composer duo, Sachin Jigar, headlining Anubhav!

Having scored a number of successful soundtracks in the last few years, the magical duo has become a massive hit across the country. See you on the 26th of January at Pronites Ground as Sachin Jigar are all set to blast the stage with their thrilling performance!

Thank you, Eminence Group Of Entertainment.

#SpringFest2018
#Anubhav
#SJLive

Spring Fest, IIT Kharagpur in association with Kolkata Knight Riders present Knight Run, a 6 km marathon event throughout the 2,100 acre campus of IIT Kharagpur. With a cash prize worth INR 10,000 at stake, the winners stand a chance to win exciting incentives from Kolkata Knight Riders.
Register at : http://springfest.in

#SpringFest2018

Spring Fest, IIT Kharagpur in association with Kolkata Knight Riders present Knight Run, a 6 km marathon event throughout the 2,100 acre campus of IIT Kharagpur. With a cash prize worth INR 10,000 at stake, the winners stand a chance to win exciting incentives from Kolkata Knight Riders.
Register at : http://springfest.in

#SpringFest2018

Spring Fest, IIT Kharagpur announces the third act of Global Music Festival, Christian Brock, a fingerstyle guitarist from Denmark. Be there to experience the melodies of nature through his musical performance. 

#SpringFest2018
#GlobalMusicFestival

This Spring Fest, be a part of the Shot On One Plus workshop followed by a photo walk as you may get a chance to win some cool OnePlus goodies!

#SpringFest2018

#ShotOnOnePlus

Spring Fest, IIT Kharagpur and Nomura present Guest Lecture by Sh. Rajat Sharma. Popular for his famous talk show ‘Aap Ki Adalat’, Rajat Sharma is Chairman and Editor-in Chief of India TV. He has been bestowed one of India’s highest civilian honors, “The Padma Bhushan Award”. Rajat Sharma, who has been equated with Jeremy Paxman by Britain’s Guardian News Paper, has put over 800 personalities in the ‘dock’ on his show.
Be there on the 28th to hear him talk about his life experiences.

#GuestLecture
#SpringFest2018

Spring Fest, IIT Kharagpur along with Bengal Energy Limited and Inshorts present Penathlon, the online creative writing event, in association with Write India.
You can submit your entry on any one of the following themes with a word limit of 2000 words to penathlon.sf18@gmail.com.

1. Media, both informative and social, should be held accountable for the veracity of information propagated by/through it.
2. All cryptocurrencies should be banned.
3. Man Booker Prize should be decided by popular vote.

With a Cash Prize of INR 7000 up for grabs. Let your thoughts flow free and your words shape perspectives!

#SpringFest2018
#Literary

Bringing to you the beatboxing sensation straight from Iceland, Beatur will be dropping the bass in Spring Fest 2018. The currently Icelandic beatbox champion is not only one of the best beatboxers in Iceland but is known globally.

Be prepared to feel the beat this Spring Fest!

#SpringFest2018
#StreetCarnival

Spring Fest, IIT Kharagpur and MRF Tyres continue the ongoing musical additions to this edition of Spring Fest, by presenting to you MissChief, a pop band from Singapore. As part of the Global Music Festival, this band is all set to take the stage and shake you entirely with their soul touching music. This is one performance you do not want to miss!

#SpringFest2018

Spring Fest, IIT Kharagpur proudly presents Labyrinth 8.0, the Online Mind Maze, sponsored by SanDisk. Prepare to seek answers to pretty simple questions but made more enthralling by the way they are hidden to the mind! Scrounge through your webpage matching clues and hints to find the right answers. 
Labyrinth kicks off on the 14th of January, 3 PM.
With prizes worth INR 10,000 up for grabs, log on to https://labyrinth.springfest.in to start the journey and stumble upon your treasure. Good luck! 
#SF18

For the first time at the Street Carnival of Spring Fest, we bring to you Dawid Krzyżowski FOOTBALL FREESTYLER all the way from Poland. The Polish Red Bull Street Style Champion is one of the finest freestylers in the country.
Be there at Spring Fest 2018 to witness some mind-blowing tricks!

Spring Fest, IIT Kharagpur and MRF Tyres present Rangmanch, the inter-collegiate stage play event in association with Akshara Theater and Chilsag Chillies Theatre Company. If you believe that the world is a stage and we are merely players, Rangmanch is perfect for you to showcase your talents this Spring Fest!
With Cash prize worth INR 45,000 up for grabs, register your team at: www.springfest.in. The winning act gets to perform at Akshara Theater and top three teams might get an opportunity to be a part of film production at Chilsag Chillies Theatre Company.
To know more about Rangmanch, head over to www.springfest.in

#SpringFest2018 
#Dramatics

message:
Spring Fest, IIT Kharagpur and Tata Projects Limited present I Me Myself, the Mono Acting Competition in association with CRAFT FILM School - Center for Research in Art of Film and Television.. 
When the curtain is lifted and the lights go on, can you step up to the stage and own it, on your own?
Cash prize worth INR 15,000 and scholarships worth INR 1,90,000 up for grabs!

Submit a performance video of fewer than 5 minutes to dramatics.sf18@gmail.com by 15th January '18.

#SpringFest2018
#Dramatics

When the curtain is lifted and the lights go on, can you step up to the stage and own it, on your own?
Cash prize worth INR 15,000 and scholarships worth INR 1,90,000 up for grabs!

Submit a performance video of fewer than 5 minutes to dramatics.sf18@gmail.com by 15th January '18.

#SpringFest2018

Spring Fest in association with Spreading Hope presents the Organ Donation and Transplant awareness camp. Spreading Hope is working towards getting 10 million conscientious individuals to knowingly and accountably pledge their organs, thereby saving 100,000 lives over the next 5 years.

The mission of "Spreading Hope" is being launched with a drive from Pondicherry to Ladhakh from 1st August 2017, through 9 cities and surrounding rural areas. Here is the teaser for the drive which was conducted last year.

 https://www.facebook.com/lourdofthedance/posts/932838420207641 

Be there at Spring Fest 2018 to become a register as a doner and be a part of this social cause.

Save up to 8 lives and more by pledging to be an organ donor on www.spreadinghope.in

#spreadinghopefoundation #savelives #organdonor #lourdofthedance #lourdvijay #SpringFest

Spring Fest, IIT Kharagpur presents Bran-D, a brand designing event for the marketing minds amongst you. We'll be providing you with a product, and you need to come up with a worthy name, logo and tagline for the brand that would make customers make a beeline for it.

Problem Statement: https://springfest.in/BranD.pdf

Register at: https://springfest.in/

Deadline: 10th January 2018

Spring Fest, IIT Kharagpur & OnePlus in association with The Storygraphers presents SFM - the short film-making competition.

Make a short film on any one of the following themes:
1. The Quest 
2. Madness
3. Superhero
and submit your entries at filmfestival.sf18@gmail.com. The film can be of any genre (comedy, film noir, romance, horror, action, etc.), the idea is to be creative with the themes and come up with a great story!

Deadline: 26th of January.

Win a total cash prize of INR 15 000, a complete fee waiver at workshops organised by The Storygraphers and a chance to feature in one of their short films.

Register at: www.springfest.in

#SpringFest2018
#FilmFest

Spring Fest, IIT Kharagpur and MRF Tyres present the first act of our Global Music Festival - Oskar Stenmark from Sweden in association with Sweden in India. 
The musician specializes in trumpet and flugelhorn, is also a composer and educator in brass instruments. Oskar has done a number of shows in New York & Europe and now plans to come all the way to India to amaze the crowd of Spring Fest 2018.

Stay tuned as Spring Fest unfolds its Global Music Festival, announcing more international musical acts.

#GlobalMusicFestival
#SpringFest2018

Spring Fest, IIT Kharagpur and MRF Tyres present the first act of our Global Music Festival - Oskar Stenmark from Sweden in association with Sweden in India. 
The musician specializes in trumpet and flugelhorn, is also a composer and educator in brass instruments. Oskar has done a number of shows in New York & Europe and now plans to come all the way to India to amaze the crowd of Spring Fest 2018.

Stay tuned as Spring Fest unfolds its Global Music Festival, announcing more international musical acts.

#GlobalMusicFestival
#SpringFest2018

Spring Fest, IIT Kharagpur and WBSEDCL (Govt. of West Bengal Enterprise) presents A Mighty Pen, a journalism-based event in association with Kolkata Bloggers and Write India Publishers.

Pen down your thoughts to bring about a change in society and shape perspectives. Prizes up for grabs include a Cash Prize of INR 10,000 and an additional chance to avail:
1. Internship opportunities from the Kolkata Bloggers
2. Certification and a course on journalism from Write India Publishers with a wall frame as prize and award

For more details head over to https://springfest.in/AMightyPen.pdf
Submission deadline: 10th January 2018
Register at: https://springfest.in
Design: Kushagra Ramnani

#SF2k18 #AMightyPen
#TribalTreble

story: Spring Fest, IIT Kharagpur updated their cover photo.
Spring Fest, IIT Kharagpur updated their cover photo.

message:
Spring Fest,the annual social and cultural fest of IIT Kharagpur is always one of the most awaited events for youngsters all across the nation. During the 3 days of the fest we immerse ourselves in the fun and frolic letting go of all the worries of our mundane lives. As the final countdown to the 59th edition of the fest to be held from 26th to 28nd of January, 2018 begins, we present to you the official aftermovie of the previous edition.

 So as you go through the glimpses of Spring Fest 2017- Bollywood Boulevard, mark your calendars,make your plans and get ready for Spring Fest 2018 as we begin the countdown for this edition being only 30 days away!

Register yourself at https://springfest.in/

#30DaysLeft
#SpringFest2018
#AfterMovie_BollywoodBoulevard

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=JD6zaBhSYrc

Spring Fest, IIT Kharagpur invites participation for India Calling, the social case study competition, presented by OnePlus in association with Kolkata Bloggers and Write India. Cash prize worth INR 30,000 at stake! Check out the Problem Statement at https://springfest.in/IndiaCalling.pdf 
Send in your entries at: literary.sf18@gmail.com before 11:59 pm, 10th January 2018.

message:
Clear your calendars and book your tickets as Spring Fest is set to return with it's 59th edition, bringing back the fun and memories with it.
Register now at https://springfest.in/ as we take you to a tribal adventure from 26th - 28nd January, 2018!
You can also visit the mobile website at https://m.springfest.in to register.

Website Hosting Partner: ZNetLive
Credits: Abhinav Saini, Ashutosh Sameer, Dipramit Pal, Rishit Sinha
Mobile Website credits: Akash Mandal, Nilay Pathak

#30DaystoGo #TribalTreble #SF2k18

Spring Fest, IIT Kharagpur presents Poetry Slam in association with Poetry Darbaar and with a cash prize of INR 20,000 along with other exciting prizes and gifts.

So if you have a thing for poetry, you can mail us a link to a short recital of your original poetry at literary.sf18@gmail.com before the 5th of January 2018 to take part in the online prelims for Poetry Slam.

Stay tuned for further updates on the events.
